doc.title: Behind Enemy Lines: The Making of 'Return to Castle Wolfenstein'
doc.plot: This made-for-video documentary treats first-person-shooter fans to a behind-the-scenes look at the making of Return to Castle Wolfenstein, the long awaited addition to the Castle Wolfenstein series of video games. Features interviews with the game's developers, as well as other who took part in the project, who share their experiences and talk about all the work into creating the finished product.
